title: Fast and Delicious Black Bean Soup

content.text: 1 large carrot, peeled and thinly sliced
content.eamr: ( ing-3 "1 large carrot, peeled and thinly sliced" )

content.text: 0) Heat the oil in a large pot over medium heat.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Heat"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "the oil"@8:15 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a large pot"@19:30 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "medium heat"@36:47 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Stir in the onion, bell pepper, carrot, and garlic, and cook 5 minutes, until tender.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Stir in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-1 "the onion"@11:20 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "bell pepper"@22:33 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "carrot"@35:41 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "garlic"@47:53 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-1-1 "cook"@59:63 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:duration ( dur-1-0 "5 minutes"@64:73 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-1-0 "until tender"@75:87 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Mix in 1 can black beans and chicken broth.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Mix in"@3:9 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-5 "1 can black beans"@10:27 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "chicken broth"@32:45 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 3) In a blender, puree remaining can of beans until smooth.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "puree"@17:22 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-5 "remaining can of beans"@23:45 / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-3-0 "until smooth"@46:58 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:loc ( tool-3-0 "a blender"@6:15 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 7) Mix in ham, cumin, salt, and pepper.
content.eamr:
( inst-7 / R
	:inform ( ac-7-0 "Mix in"@3:9 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-7 "ham"@10:13 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "cumin"@15:20 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-9 "salt"@22:26 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-10 "pepper"@32:38 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 9) Garnish with Cheddar cheese and sour cream to serve.
content.eamr:
( inst-9 / R
	:inform ( ac-9-0 "Garnish"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-11 "Cheddar cheese"@16:30 / FOOD )
		:gol ( NULL / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-12 "sour cream"@35:45 / FOOD )
		:prp ( purp-9-0 "to serve"@46:54 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
	)
)
